Action.body: } means <> is a regex expression orderers.*name*.grpcOptions.sslProvider.override=openSSL # name= exact name ... override it >

Action.author: rickr
Action.body: Not liking any of the solutions I've thought of yet I'm taking a different tack on this. If the protocol is SSL (grpc) the most likel cases are negotiationType TLS and sslProvider is openSSL. So if they are not provided in the specific properties for the endpoint instead of throwing an exception use a global configuration default for them.
